English: I got worried about my health.
I got confused by the question.
I became bitter and blamed him.
I get embarrassed by the attention.
I became jaded over the years.
I got offended by your words.
I was embarrassed by the revelation.
I lost my temper with him.
I get stressed because of my work.
I got frustrated with the bureaucracy.
I got angry at the boys.
He's always trying to provoke me.
He mocks the things I love.
